redBanner: If you are used to having a highest level of service and an entertainment — you should buy a season ticket to the west A stand.
There is premium quality hospitality area — Platinum Winline Club, Gold and Silver, on Otkritie Bank Arena stadium.

listSectorInfo1.title: Best seats and view
listSectorInfo1.description: The best view on the field is available for you, if you are able to choose central seats. We care about everything: a restaurant with an exclusive menu, comfortable seats, VIP parking for your car. You can relax and watch football, meet friends. The most comfortable seats are located at the stand A (Platinum).

hospitalityPackages.title: Winline Club Platinum
foodCourtData: Central seats, the most comfortable seats are located at the stand A (Platinum area);

hospitalityPackages.title: Gold
foodCourtData: Central seats are located at the stand A (sector A4 gold)

hospitalityPackages.title: Silver
foodCourtData: Central seats are located at the stand A (sector A5 Silver)
a restaurant with delicious food and drinks
